text: This is an awful establishment. I was very sick for a couple months and could not prepare my own food. Thus, I ordered food from Angelina's 2 to 3 times a week. The last time, the delivery boy delivered my pizza sideways, and all of the cheese had fallen off the pizza and glooped against the edge. The establishment refused to refund my money. All they were willing to do was send me another pizza. After all the business I gave them?! This is how they treat loyal customers. I have boycotted the establishment ever since...and so are my loved ones here in Vegas.
Thier menu is huge, they are open late, they deliver, and their pizzas taste great, and they are priced great.  Their salads are really good too.

I ordered a pizza on October 29 th, when I got home the pizza was burned (obviously burnt). I called the restaurant to inform them, asked if they could deliver a new pizza because I just picked this one up.
The lady on the call said I could come pick up another pizza or just get the next pizza free. I said ok. I recently patronized this restaurant again, ordered the pizza to pick up, however I was told they couldn't honor the free pizza because the lady who took the order which they confirmed didn't work there anymore and she did not write comments in my acct. I then said ok but how about giving me the pizza at the $9.99 price instead of charging me for the pepperoni, the lady said no I can't do that either. 
I probably ordered pizza from there twice a month for my kids but I will not be going back........

I get that places can get busy, however, I ordered early through mypizza.com, almost 2 hours later plus wasted time, about 20 min.s on hold with this place I get most of my food. Of course I was not given my pizza, I thought it was in the bag since it was small, but nope. And on top of that the food was pretty much cold. And being as busy as they were I was nice and patient called back again, on hold again. Was told they would call me back, nope. Called again, asked if I wanted the pizza still and that the driver said he gave it to me...nope! Asked to speak with a supervisor, no supervisor call back tomorrow. Called back, still no supervisor. Called the next day, spoke to Nicole a supervisor from corporate, she said call mypizza they can't really do anything. Struggle after struggle. They credit me for the pizza :/ yuck! I call her to say don't and to take me out of the system and she has the audacity to say they will put notes on me in their system if I should ever try to order again. NO Nicole, that will never happen. And what's more you guys put me through BS and of course after 3 days of BS I'm going to get irritated and not be that nice. You guys need to learn organization, time management, and you need to have supervisors working everyday. And for deliveries, and I know this because my father in law owns an Italian restaurant out here, take only 2 orders a time when delivering that way the order stays hot and all the food gets taken to the right place. That or your drivers just could care less. Sorry so long but gezzz... I'm frustrated you guys should have handled this better, if you had been nice I would have said no big deal it happens but you were not!

We ordered wings and a pizza. We waited for an hour and 45 minutes for it to finally get here. It came cold and was disgusting. The crust was soggy and doughy. Absolutely awful. Will never order here again.

Worst place ever.  Have never been so upset before with a business. Not only did the driver verbally assault me but proceeded to say the f word at least 10 times during the conversation where he told me he wouldn't place the food where I asked him to and complained about working on his day off. In addition he proceeded to tell me that they do not like dealing with medical professionals.  When I called the manager she acted like it was no big deal and essentially defended this type of customer service. Foods not worth it to be treated this way.

For delivery it was pretty damn good. Everything was warm and delicious. The only thing that could have been better- fettuccine Alfredo needs more cheese. Spaghetti- needs more cheese and more sauce. Everything else- mozzarella sticks, garlic balls, and garlic bread- perfect!

The most poorly managed "restaurant" I have seen in some time. Every report of uncooked food you see in these reviews falls squarely on managements inability to actually manage. I feel for the poor employees who have had to deal with ineptitude on such a scale, not to mention the customers. The only reason this place get's repeat customers (if you exclude the bar regulars who would clearly order from whatever "restaurant" was attached to the same building as their bar) is because on those rare moments when everything get's cooked to completion, and the managers don't F up the employees ability to actually provide good service to the CUSTOMER, the food is actually pretty good. However, it is shameful that the employees have to deal with upset customers and even be fearful of losing their ability to provide for themselves and their families because management, and as a clear extension ownership, has no effing clue how to treat PEOPLE, the MOST important facet of the service industry. Good management requires consistency and honesty, clearly concepts these managers lack the aptitude to grasp.

  Angelina's should be reported to whatever powers that be for creating a hostile and unfair work environment as well as putting their customers health at risk for consistently allowing unsafe food to be served. They are a blemish on the service industry and I sincerely hope you choose NOT to patronize their establishment.

Went in to order chicken fingers and fries, I was told that the order would only take about 10 minutes. 15 minutes later I look up and see the staff casually sitting and chatting with each other and their friends. A man comes to the counter and ask for his pizza that he had been waiting 25 minutes for. The employees then tell him that they just put it in the oven because the computers were down and the kitchen wasn't getting any orders. So I then, walk up and ask about my order. The lady proceeded to tell me the same thing. I then asked her why her and her coworkers were chatting it up instead of checking on our orders. She couldn't tell and went on to apologize about the kitchen staff and the computers being down. After waiting for another 8 minutes I was given my order. No one apologized or offered anything to make up for a 25 minute wait on 5 chicken fingers and a side of fries.

Wow, ordered my food got it in less than 30 mins. Half pineapple half plain. All I can say finally a pizza place I can stick to. The sauce is tasteful and the crust is delicious. Recommend anymore to give Angelina's a shake they go above and beyond.

Went there once and fell in love!!! Great pizza and service. They messed up on our large half pep half cheese pizza and asked if we would be ok if they gave us an additional small cheese pizza. Well duh! I was very pleased and that's what kept me going back. However, upon my recent visits I haven't been impressed. I asked them to cook my jalapeño poppers a lil longer so they're crispy (past employees have for me) and instead I get a "no because they will pop open". I could have saved myself a few bucks and bought some frozen ones from smiths for the quality I received. Same goes for the zucchini sticks... Probably won't go back unless I'm getting pizza.
They are our go-to pizzeria. We like the party pizza. It's easy when we have a lot of people over. The crust is crispy and not too soggy/ oily. Staff are friendly and delivery is usually fast!

I USED TO love this place. I literally ordered from them once a week for about four years. Until, the food started to be over and under cooked, my order took almost TWO HOURS when they said 15-30 minutes(I live 3 blocks down) with no call to notify me of the new wait time, and they suddenly can no longer upgrade my side salad to a full size for a small charge (as they have always done) I now have to have a side salad and buy a full salad seperate. The best thing about this place is the delivery guys! they're always amazing and so polite the rest of the company really needs help. They officially lost my business tonight. I ordered at 6:35 pm and just got my food at 8:14pm

These people don't care about your orders. They serve the most un taste food . They have a order taker that dose not speak English. So therefore she screws up your order . basically  she orders what she thinks  you.wants. besides  that the food has no taste.  And they over charge. The food is always cold. Did I mention the food has no flavor. Your are better off making your food your self. Thanks.

Horrible service. Placed an online order, ordered a chicken Caesar wrap without chicken and extra cheese. Had the order picked up no extra cheese but had chicken. We had to take it back and the rude lady was at first refusing to remake it because she couldn't read where it clearly said no chicken. This place shouldn't last long. Wish you could leave a negative star rating
Great thing about Angelina's is that it's open late. It's just a little pricy at times. Definitely love the white pizza and chili cheese fries with nacho cheese yummmm

Ordered from Uber Eats; satisfied! The chicken philly sub (made into a wrap) was delicious. The breaded mushrooms are terrible, more breading than mushroom. You can get an entire pack that taste better and bake them at home for cheaper from the grocery store down the street. No complains otherwise and the Uber driver was right on time.

My husband and I decided to order from Angelina's Pizzeria. After spending $57 on food and waiting 1.5 hours for the food it never arrived. We called the Cheyenne store and while my husband was talking to the first girl a 2nd person snatched the phone from him and said "We don't deliver to you byebye" *Click*. Just like that with no pause or hesitation hung up. Never called to tell use they couldn't deliver, never offered a refund. Just took our money and hung up on us. When I called back she called me hun over and over again with a snarky attitude. She still would not offer a resolution as in delivering the order that was now 2 hours passed or a refund. She tried to blame it on everyone and everything yet would not take responsibility for it. She even admitted to hanging up and didn't care. She said her name was Yurie and claimed to be the manager which I hope is not true. Do not order food from here unless you like donating money to girls with bad attitudes. Since they were unwilling to do anything we called one of their other locations(Charleston) who was willing to make the food and delivery it to us. Thank you Charleston for helping us and following through on what the other store would not. Why the Cheyenne location could not call us and refund the order I will never understand. Heck why did she have to hang up on us without letting us say a word is beyond me. It shouldn't be a battle to get either a refund or the order delivered.
We ended up throwing the food away because it was so gross. Worst-tasting delivery food ever. The driver was also too lazy to walk up my 3 flights of stairs.

I love this place, awesome pizza and delicious calzones.  I asked for extra sauce for delivery and they gave me so much! Personally I use a ridiculous amount of sauce so the fact they gave me more than enough made me so happy! You have my business for life!

Call Metro Pizza now!

How is Angelina still in business?
They screw up everything and then have an attitude about it.  Blamed it on the 3rd party delivery service and said I need to contact them to resolve issue.
Delivered my pizzas on the wrong day, don't speak a lick of English, tried to charge me and told me I need to call EAt24 to get reimbursed.

No, just NO to all of it.
Avoid, Avoid, Avoid Angelina's Pizza!

Ordered on-line (using the Eat24 site)---it said 45-60 minutes, but then the restaurant confirmed the delivery time and it was going to be about 1h 20min.  At first I was a little disappointed (i was hungry!), but WAS a Friday at 4:30pm, so I decided to just get ready for work 1st anyway---knowing I had time before my delivery (I'm sure you can see where this is going...).  About 30min later--less than an hour after my order was placed, I heard my doorbell.  YES!  I was embarrassed that I had made the guy wait for me to run downstairs, but we was very pleasant as he handed me my food.  
  I ordered their "Angelina's Special" pizza (minus the olives), mozz cheesesticks and Fettucini Alfredo--- my work peeps deserved some yummy food.  I had to steal a piece of pizza and try a mozz stick---both were really good.  I haven't tried the Fettucini yet, but it looks really good.
  I have ordered from Angelina's before, but wasn't "mind-blown" enough to review my experience.  We frequently only review the bad, so I felt they needed a shout-out for a job well done!  Thanks Angelina's!

Just fantastic.

We tried Angelina's for the first time and were hooked. They food is amazing with innovative takes on pizza and wing flavorings. They custom make their ranch dressing/dip and it shows. Service is personal and reliable.

The service from this restaurant does not even deserve 1 star. Today my company had a large catering order delivered and the delivery person was unacceptably rude. He cursed at staff and created a scene in front of customers. This was quite embarrassing for our business and a disturbance to witnesses. The delivery man told us we did not verbalize which floor the food was being delivered to although the receipt indicated the correct room number. He then proceeded to state he didn't have to deal with this "insert curse word" because it was his day off. The language and profanity he decided to use can not be typed in this review! What a disgrace to this restaurant's name. To top that off, the manager we contacted after did not seem to care about this behavior or inconvenience. Rather, she thought it was necessary to justify this absurd and obscene behavior. I will no longer be ordering from here and I suggest you don't either.

Angelina's has the best pizza, calzone's, and stromboli's in the area!! Eat there at least 3 times a month.  More when football season starts.  Koz is the bartender there at the times we are.  He's awesome!  He creates the craziest drinks ever!  Always a good time!  Great neighborhood hang out.
I love this place for delivery! The cheeseburgers and fries are delicious! Great service and food is always warm upon delivery!

It could stand to be a little cheaper just because the quality is less than great. But overall if you need potato skins at 1am they definitely deliver, the sour cream is weird though they should switch brands.

I wish there was a way to give no stars!!  we are new to the area and saw the menu left on our door one day we came home. So we thought we should try it. 

BIG MISTAKE!! We ordered our food at 2pm & they said it would be an hour. It's 4:20pm our food is STILL NOT HERE!!! What happened you asked?!?? 

My fiancée called back at 3:09 to find out why it's taking so long and it just so happens the deliver guy got lost, his GPS stopped working, he drove to a gas station to get the directions and by the time he figured out how to get here the food was cold so he decided to get back. They now said he would be 30min to get out food and that it was on the house.  
 
My fiancée decided to call now a 4th time and they said it'd be here in 10 minutes!! Hahahaha! Oh please that's a load of CRAP!!  

Honestly I am so upset and frustrated about this whole ordeal that I want to call back and tell them not to bother!! We will NOT be ordering from there EVER again! I hope you guys have better luck with these guys. SERIOUSLY WHAT A JOKE OF A BUSINESS!!

We just order from this place pizza and it was terrible!!!!
The  cheese was like gum 
Very cheap cheese!!
And the guy is making the pizza need to find different job!!
We threw it away all the pizza to the trash

This pizza is so unbelievably good.  Oh my gosh, by far the best pizza I've had in vegas.  Huge slices, with yummy gooey cheese!  Ugh so good!!! The delivery people are always nice and food comes piping hot!!! My favorite pizza I have ever had, and it's even delicious reheated the next day.  If I could eat this everyday without getting fat I would. Lol.  I will Def order again.  And again. Yummmmm.

Came in here to eat while waiting for my car to get done. First walked in and honestly thought it was just a bar till one of the workers said if I was looking for the pizza place. Ordered the Teri cheese burger and a tray of wings half honey bbq/garlic parmesan. the food was great, burger was juicy, fries were steak cut and extra crispy (yum), and the wings were honestly imo just ok. They seem a slight overcooked not by much but just enough to the point where they were fried and no longer tender. Server was on point and friendly.
Really good pizza and pasta !! Everything  we've  ever had has been  awesome,  fast delivery !! Try it, you can't go wrong.

I've tried Angelina's many times and it is always good. The Zeppoles are my secret weakness and I can't get Angleinas without ordering them. Other items like the chicken sandwiches are also good as well as their pizzas that they're known for.

They say that lasagna is their specialty, ($16.99))what a laugh! You need a chainsaw to cut through it! It was old and had been microwaved. Their meatballs were the frozen kind thrown in marinara and hoping you wouldn't notice!! This place is a joke!! Save your money! I wouldn't even give them 1 star but you have to to leave your review
This pizza is so good. Delicious every single time. garlic balls are our fav. And the best part...they're open late!

Nice little mom and pop pizzaria. Huge menu. Everything we've eaten was very good. No complaints whatsoever. It's also attached to a very friendly bar. Best of both worlds. Kid friendly on the restaurant side.

Ordered a gyro and a cup of soup for delivery because I wasn't feeling well. The food was good, but an hour and a half for delivery when it's five minutes away? Beyond ridiculous. 2 stars because I've had the pizza before and it's good too but the wait time is always ridiculous. I went to pick up one time and they told me they had not even started my pizza yet when I got there. I used to live on the Eastside and always had a good experience with the location on Sloan and Charleston. It just seems like this location cares more about the bar than the food.

Ordered the buffalo chicken pizza, wrote in the order that there was a tomato allergy. Once they received the order they called me to confirm that I had a tomato allergy and wanted olives added to the pizza which I appreciated. But the pizza came and not only did it have a disgusting amount of ranch on it but it had no olives and had tomato sauce on it  they did send a new pizza in exchange for  the second and brought us a white pizza which was solidly okay. Overall disappointed

If you want your credit card number stolen and find out that's it was the delivery boy that did it, go head call Angelina's. This place has the worst service. My credit card numbers where stolen the day before i ordered pizza from this place. I called them 3 times but the manager thinks she's all that and never returned my phone call. Never dealing with this crooks anymore.

I ordered around 1 am due to being a fatty and being lazy to make something at that time. Me and my bf were craving some junk food and saw this place open decided to order. The delivery was the only thing took 45 minutes, the delivery guy was really nice and brought us cheese and chili pepper overall no complaints with the food it was good we ordered a pep and mushroom pizza and wings.
Poor customer service, typical bar staff. Maybe not use a fax as a form of communication with third party delivery service? Other than that, the food is great.

I was surprised that they had nachos at a pizzeria! It was really good! 

We ordered the chicken soup and the capese salad, I know what a weird combination, but it was all good.

Definitely ordering from here again!!

If I could give no stars I would. I ordered a Margarita Pizza and waited two hours for delivery and still did not receive the pizza. When I called to find out what happened to the pizza, the lady over the phone said that the delivery guy had already come by and knocked on the door and that he said my phone number that I gave them didn't work. I asked her why he didnt try ringing the doorbell, and she said he knocked and that knocking should have been good enough. When I told her I had received no missed calls and asked her when they could try to re-deliver the pizza, she said we would have to wait ANOTHER couple hours because the driver had already come out once and that we were going to be put at the end of the line. When I asked to speak to the manager, she of course said that the manager had already gone home for the day. This woman made no effort to make this right. 

I told her that waiting another two hours was ridiculous because we still hadn't even received our pizza. We cancelled our order and decided to never use Angelina's Pizza again. What's to boot, is that we got charged over the phone for a pizza that we never even received. 

Worst service ever!!!!!

never had a problem with this place i use to travel all the way on russell sometimes to get their pizza cause its so good and worth the price. now there is one close by my house and i am happy i usually order the las vegas  all meat pizza, or chicken tender and fries, they ways give you a lot of food.

I got home late from work last night and didn't feel like cooking or going anywhere. While searching Yelp Angelina's pulled up for delivery, I haven't eaten here before so figured what the heck I'll try it.  I ordered the Las Vegas All Meat Pizza and I was absolutely amazed. From the crust to each slice being equally proportioned I couldn't say anything bad. I love pizza and am usually unimpressed by a lot of the places we eat at in Vegas and this particular pizza was great. No complaints here, eat24 made it easy and it was delivered quick.

This place is amazing, great customer service! Best pizza in town!
They always are so fast and so friendly

Nice job. The pizza taste like shit and is half raw. I love my pizza with a pound of cheese smooshed to one side. Nice job driver. Also, I love my "extra ranch". The sweet SINGLE 2 oz. ranch. We tried to give you the benefit of the doubt and you wanna say for future reference don't eat the pizza... for future reference make the f&@*#% pizza right... is it hard?  Simp...

My to go order is never made on time. There's always a weak excuse as to why. So while I wait, the cashier sits & eats his dinner, choppin it up with friends or regulars, laughing and carrying on. When I approach him & ask if he'll check on my food, he looks at me like how dare I interrupt his break time. I'm not exactly sure why this place even makes food. Terrible service.

This was a last resort effort to get good Italian food near my house. I was very dissappointed.The calamari were just big rings fried to a level that it felt like I was eating a tire. The pizza was very unappetizing as well. Putting a restaurant in a bar might not be the best idea after all. I also tried the tortellini hoping upon hope that it would be made with panna, piseli, prosciutto or panceta, and parmeggiano cheese mixed into the sauce. Their version of this was defrosted tortellini
 immersed in a similar cheese sauce they put on an Arby's Beef & Cheddar. Not conducive to a proper pasta dish. Maybe if we give them some time to figure things out the place might be able to get a following. They've already lost this one.

Worst customer service ever ...How do you charge someone's card over the phone for delivery and then when the driver comes he refuses to give you your food because you don't have the physical card . The girl that took our order in the phone did not mention that . $30 down the tubes that won't be credited back to the card 3-5 days and no food (HUNGRY) waited 50 minutes . Called back and the girl that initially took my order lied about our entire conversation and when I asked if she was the manager she said she was but wouldn't provide her first and last name . Their corporate office needs to be aware that this location is FULL SHIT !!! Person that took our order is YURI with no last name smh . We only ordered two burgers and fries nothing fancy so how did she FUCK this up . Do not order from this place ever

Ordered chicken wings and cheesy bread. Was advised that it would be ready in 20 minutes. Went to Sonic drive through for ice cream for dessert. Time on the receipt was 18 minutes after ordering the wings. Drove to Angelina's expecting the wings to be waiting. Was told they would be ready in a minute or two. I left the restaurant 25, yes 25, minutes later. Ice cream was ruined. I get home and they screwed up the order. Call them up and complain. Five phone calls later they deliver the correct order. Ice cream was still ruined and customer service sucks.

Ordered delivery. Ordered calamari, pizza, wings and a mushroom philly cheese, everything was tasty and they delivered fAster than expected (expected almost an hour estimated time, but it took ~40 mins). My bf really really like their food and would order again.

Ordered 12 wings got all drums no flats. Fries sucked and no excuse for time. Delivery was late and I could jog there in 5 minutes.  This place sucks. Too bad case putters the bar is ok. Food sucks balls.

Awesome, Chanielle is a great server! The food is fantastic and we love it here!!!
Pizza, Wings, zeppoli etc is excellent!

Had Angelina's last night since my wife and I didn't feel like cooking.

I phoned in my order for pick up. The clerk was friendly and repeated my order to ensure accuracy. Sure it was a single item but it's a good practice. Wait time would be 15-20 minutes which is reasonable.

The pizza itself is great, especially for the price. NY style pizza with a thin crust and not overly sauced. not amazing but better than a lot of other independent pizzerias and much better than the chains. I'd gladly recommend this place. I'm not sure why folks had bad experiences before but personally I'm satisfied and they'll get my business again.

Ordered a personal size sausage pizza and some garlic knots... oh man, the garlic knot order was crazy big!  It filled a whole take out container and I was only able to eat about 4 in one sitting.  It's a great appetizer to share, for sure.  The pizza was good but not NYC style.  The sausage was good and the sauce wasn't too sweet or too spicy.  The boyfriend didn't like the knots because he said it was too greasy.

I was a bit hesitant ordering from a place I haven't been before but to my surprise the food was delicious!!! Now, I am a repeat customer. Doesn't matter what you order, everything is delicious!! These aren't your ordinary fries and not your average burger or mediocre pizza, the food here is made to taste sooo yummy!!! I grew up back east and I know what food should taste like, this place exceeds exception and I would definitely recommend to friends and family, that's for sure!!!

Never ordering here again. Rude and place smells like an ashtray. Smoke smell so bad. And when we arrive for pick up and place is dead, why so long to make food?  The hostess took told us to wait longer for pizza to be ready, stepped away from desk and smoked cigarette in the corner. Yuck.
We had there pizza the other night and it was great so tonight we are trying the Godfather sub.
I ordered the Mexican Burger for delivery. The stubborn soda was alright but what got me was the burger. It was heaven. I would recommend 10/10
I won't ever order an anchovie pizza from there again...disgusting...see photo; cans of anchovies dumped onto the pizza.  Sticker shock when 2 pitchers of beer came to $44...next!!

I don't know what is going on at Angelina's but they have gone down the tubes the last few months! 
We used to order from them at least once a week. We probably won't order from them ever again. The last three-four times we have ordered, be it online or phone, it has taken over an hour for the food to be ready. When we get it, cold and crusty. 
It's very disappointing as we used to love their food.

Order food last night. To start, they forgot a salad. Then we informed them that they had out lettuce and tomato on the burger, which we had specifically ordered it without. Also, the bun was as hard as a rock. So the person who ordered the burger could now no longer eat. Rather than rectify the issue they argued and said that's not what their order said. About 20 min later the delivered the salad they forgot and some free desserts. The smart thing to do would have been to send a new burger cause my brother who ordered it ended up just going to sleep with out eating. I will never order from here again. This place really deserves less than 1 star but since it's the lowest you can give they're lucky.

Great service! Came all the way down from Los Angeles to come enjoy pizza & a drink from the world famous Angelina's! 
The inside was completely spotless. It was so clean! 
The waiter came over and took my drink order immediately and was excellent at communicating with his tables. 
If you're looking for a nice spot in Las Vegas, this is the place to go!
Great food and great service. Wish they had a non=smoking section.  The food is great, I had the shrimp and chicken Parmesan, the portion size was large. I will eat here again.

First time I have ordered from here.... wow!... the whole group thought that this is the best pizza in vegas.....delivery was great.... pizza were amazing..... wow... found my new pizza ... thank you!!
Midnight delivery on a weekday. Pizza was awesome, and wings were awesome. Took awhile to delivery but it was totally worth it.

I have ordered from them many times in the past. The food is good. HOWEVER, possibly the WORST customer service I've ever received. Ordered a specialty pizza, only to have my entire order completely messed up. I was home and ready to watch the hockey game with my family. I called them back and they said they would make a new one, but I had to drive 15 minutes back for it, and I had to return the one they messed up! So, my family has to sit here, hungry, not eat while they watch the game, and I have to waste gas AND get zero compensation? I was very polite when I first asked what else could be done or if my daughter could have one slice of what we had so she wouldn't get sick. The lady snapped at me and then HUNG UP ON ME. I am appalled and will NEVER be returning.

Great food. We eat at the bar quite often. Beware the Strombolis and calzones are enormous. Most of their good is pretty heavy, but pizza and wings are always good. If there is ever any problem, they go out of their way to fix it. Tara and Rick are awesome. Boyfriend loves the blackened chicken Caesar salad, and their nacho cheese sauce is awesome (I recommend it on the criss cut fries).

Worst delivery at any hour. Food took over an hour to leave location. I had to call the pizzeria four times, was placed on hold three times before I could speak to anyone. Kept getting put on hold. Was calling to ask about delivery time. Still waiting! Open until 2am, the lights are on but nobody is home. Needless to say, if I live in Vegas I expect Vegas service. Which i'm sure all of you would agree we in the industry strive to give the best customer service around the globe! So bummed and still waiting for my food. WTF
Finally spoke to a Carrie/Kerry. She wasn't to thrilled I asked her name or about my purchase on Yelp! Not to mention my garlic knots came without sauce- wtf. The$8  pizza was enough for 1 person, definitely an appetizer size.

Mediocre at best.  I paid extra for the meat sauce on my lasagna on a delivery order and it only had marinara  sauce.  The tiramisu is from a box and not home made so was very disappointing for the price.  It also took over an hour to get and I only live 3.7 miles away, literally less than a 5 minute drive.

I decided to try a new local spot tonight and settled on the highly seen, but never tried, restaurant, Angelina's Pizzeria. The pizza is very good; very much above average with an abundance of toppings, fresh-tasting cheese, and quality dough; the crust had a bit of a butter flavor. The fries seemed to have a batter on them and, if this is the case, were not completely covered with batter. They also were stale and I believe I was served a regular order instead of the purchased large. Finally, if you enjoy your hot wings with just a touch of ice in the middle, this is the place to be. Maybe this was a bad night to try them out but one should  NEVER serve meat, especially poultry, undercooked. When in doubt use a thermometer, please. Very disappointing. I'll stick to Grand Pizza.

Just had my first order from this place and I am so happy!! The pizza is really good and the wings are seriously amazing!! They are my new place for pizza and wings!!! The customer service was also excellent and the delivery was fast!!

What a great quaint place this turned out to be. After dozens of trips to Vegas to visit family we had always seen this place nearby, as well as ads at the in-laws' home, but none of us (including the in-laws) had ever tried it. We were interested in getting a Stromboli and were considering the 4 Kegs, our old standby. Glad we went here, as their Stromboli was DELICIOUS! Sorry 4 Kegs, but we will get our fix here in the future unless the quality of the food was an anomaly. The Stromboli was larger and the crust was thinner, and the ingredients thick and loaded. 

The atmosphere was great, integrated with a small sports bar setting within the same building. At least here we felt a little safer, although I always pack heat while in Vegas, not having to be viewed on a camera and buzzed in like at 4 Kegs. The beer was cold, although that aspect was a little too pricey ($9 Blue Moon on tap). The service was excellent, also, with attentive (but not annoying) waitresses. 

I highly recommend you try out both places and make your own determination, but we give 2 thumbs up for Angelina's. Now, we only tried the Stromboli so we can't judge the other food items - which they had plenty of on the extensive menu.

Where do I begin? The temperature of the food was just warm. I asked for no bacon on the potato skins, they came with plenty of bacon. The chips to the nachos tasted stale. They give you plenty of chips in your nachos. The calamari was blah. The burger was the best thing I ordered. I wasn't pleased at all.

So it's 11:30pm and i'm starving normally I'm pretty great at sticking to a healthy diet but let's face it 11:30pm is a fatty food type of time.  I go on eat24 and Angelinas pops up as one of the limited places to get something to eat and get delivery at this time. ... went with the coupon with 1 topping 14 inch pizza went with the traditional pepperoni and a 10 piece wing (hot garlic) for 16.99 after tax and delivery less than $25 $23 to be exact.  The pizza not the best ive ever tasted but sheesh it's pretty darn good!!! The wings pretty meaty and a great garlicky flavor wish it was a little spicier but good . Everything arrived within 38 minutes from order to delivery.  If I'm ever hungry around the later hours and not feeling diety ;) will definitely order again.  Definitely going to order lunch more as well. Give it a try pretty tasty .

Our food was FANTASTIC... Chicken Fingers and a Bacon Cheeseburger.... Hot Hot Food and the fingers weren't those small little clumps of breading.... I am a chinken finger connoisseur and these were 4 stars!!!

Picked up a phone order on Sunday afternoon. I live just a few blocks away & the pizza was barely even warm. They gave me a pie that was made an hour or so earlier & didn't even warm it up for me! Never had this happen at Sabattini's (and the sauce is better).

I made an order 2 hours ago, I called after the first hour and a half and was told my delivery was on its way. I live 5 minutes from the place. Still no food. 

I used to order here a lot but I'm done after this. Worst delivery service in the area. Do yourself a favor and order somewhere else. There's at least 10 other place or similar quality that will get you or food on time.

My friend and I stumbled across Angelina's one night while out late and I fell in love with the food immediately!  We ordered just a pepperoni pizza and an order of the Zeppolis (which I highly recommend... such a simple yet delicious dessert!)   The pizza was just as good heated up in the oven the next day.  My next trip I ordered pizza and the cheesy bread... again was not disappointed at all.  It's only been 2 weeks since my first trip and I've already been 3 times since then... LOVE IT!

10 minutes on hold to order a pizza .. I finally hung up the phone and from now on will take my business elsewhere 
 TERRIBLE SERVICE

I came in to Angelinas Pizza for a 14" pepperoni to go. What better way to end a week than a bit of your favorite pizza and a beer at the very nearby Putters.

I was psyched when I saw Angelinas open up here. There used to be a couple others in the area that are either a new place or simply gone. This has been some of my favorite pizza for many uears now. The crust is thin and and chewy just the way I like it. The sauce has good flavor but is not as spicy as some sauce I've had. There is an average amount of pepperoni (I wish there was more). The cheese is super gooey. And the pizza as a whole is never overly greasy. I love it.

My visit to this addition of the Angelinas family was a good one. A 14" pie for less than $10 and I got two meals out of it. Service was fast and friendly and the pizza was 100% correct. And it took exactly the same time to make my pizza as it did for me to enjoy a pint while waiting.

I'm a very workable person. I understand my options late at night that delivers, are slim to none; however, if a company states there is a 60 minute wait time, they should abide by that said wait time. I contrast, I placed an order at 11:30p ignoring the reviews, in addition to their star count (I believe everyone deserves a chance to prove themselves),  and after I had to make multiple phone calls, didn't receive my order until 1:30a. That's just highly unacceptable service. If there was a method for me to remove my predetermined tip, I would from my credit card. To add insult to injury, nothing was considered out of the ordinary when talking to the receptionist, so simply stated that the order is late, and then proceeded to hang up on me.
Decent pizza.  Large menu.  We ordered the tiramisu which I don't recommend.

Amaze balls .,.. the garlic balls that is lol

Great phillys too

Dang how many words does this damn yelp want me to write I said it's good what more can I say

I have ordered from Angelina's Pizzeria twice. Both times delivery. 
The first time I ordered a large cheese pizza, an order of chicken fingers, and a chef salad. The pizza was not my fav, it was okay, but not great. The chicken fingers were good, I got them plain with the hot sauce on the side. So they were still nice and crispy through the delivery process.  The chef salad was one of the best salads I have received by delivery, it was so fresh and loaded with red onion, grape tomato, turkey, ham, cheese, egg, and really good ranch dressing. Yummy! 
So when the family got a chicken finger craving I thought this was the place to order from, this time I skipped the pizza, ordered a bucket of fingers and the chef salad. 
The order arrived super quick, the chicken fingers were good and a lot of them. This time however the salad was a huge disappointment. It was wilted and so so sad. Nothing about it was the same fresh delicious salad that I had the first time........ 
Torn between two and three stars. The salad was so good the first time I didn't want to give them two stars, but his place seems kinda hit or miss...... I am not much of a gambler.

Placed an order through Eat24 at 4pm requesting a 5pm delivery. At 6:40 and after several phone calls the food finally showed up. The pizza toppings were incorrect and the zucchini sticks were soggy and cold. I am not sure if the issue was with the restaurant or with eat24, but next time I'll just haul myself out to pick up a pizza from somewhere else. It was nearly impossible to get through to the Angelinas to find out if the food was coming or if we should just give up - it was a Friday night, I get it's busy - but getting hung up on twice while on hold was disheartening. I'm bummed, because I was excited to find a delivery place with such an extensive menu :(

I've ordered from this location MANY times. I always get delivery and they take orders up to 2AM.
   I've tried three of their "gourmet" pizzas and their white pizza is by far the BEST. Lots of garlic and ricotta. And the second goes to their BBQ chicken pizza, although if you don't like green bell peppers I'd avoid this one, there's A LOT.  Lastly, I tried their pesto and I was disappointed in it, wouldn't order that ever again.
Their chicken fingers are very good, so I would recommend them, and they have good "money saver" specials for those and pizzas together.
As far as their appetizers go, the garlic balls for the price and quantity are your best choice. I've had their calamari and fried zucchini and you can tells its just prepackaged and all frozen. Which I understand, but the flavor is really lacking. 
Overall, I would recommend this place!!

40 minutes for a takeout medium cheese pizza on a Sunday evening? Seriously? Two stars for the honesty I guess. Pfft I'll go elsewhere. 

Updated to 4 stars. Have been back a few times since. Pizza yummy and service better now.

Just ordered food, it showed up fast and the food was delicious. I'm really picky about pizza and I like theirs a lot, we got the 18 inch cheese with extra cheese. We also ordered chicken fingers and fries and they're yummy. Will definitely order from here again soon!

This is my go to Sports bar and restaurant, whenever I'm in the mood for Pizza and wings. The Philly subs are delicious and the service is exceptional. Chanielle was my waiter today and he is very helpful and provided us with exceptional service.
I'd recommend this place to anyone who likes American food, Sports, and games such as Pool, darts, and Machine games. Don't forget to check out the new hockey table game with the Golden Knights crest! That is out of this world
Since my last review this pizza has gone to shits Lol!  Maybe new management or ingredients? Haven't been back in a very long time.

These people are by far the most uneducated rude people I have ever met. There service is terrible. We have ordered from here probably 8 times to give them the benefit of the doubt and every single time it is wrong. They have absolutely no customer service skills and this is by far the worst place I have ever seen. Lost my business for life.

Heard it was good, took a chance on ordering..got the BBQ chicken pizza..to my surprise is was good.. ordered potatoe skins,stuff jalapeno, fish and chips..Got home and realized no stuff jalapenos...called them up ...I got my stuff jalapeno and another BBQ pizza just for the trouble..Great Customer service! Great Food! I have ordered again and had no problems...things happens..they fixed it.. I would have not returned if they didn't provide good service. I am a satisfied customer!

The staff was not very attentive, they didn't seem to pay attention to the front counter at all. The pizza was a bit on the cold side, I'm curious as to their methods of keeping pizzas hot while waiting to be picked up? It was so much so that the box wasn't even warm when held from the bottom. The boneless wings sat in sauce rather than being coated in them, about average in taste but also cold in temperature. 
However in my opinion the pizza was indeed very tasty, although the sauce didn't seem to be too present visually, the taste was spot on. The crust was also very enjoyable. 

All in all I may order from here again, but I would recommend waiting around and picking up your food once it's finished to avoid getting a cold product. However I just don't think the food and service is worth the money spent.

The food might be good, I wouldn't know. We ordered a combo appetizer, potato skins, salad, wings, cheeseburger and fries. They completely forgot ALL the dressings and condiments. 

I called and asked them to deliver the 3 ranch dressings, sour cream, marinara sauce, medium buffalo sauce, ketchup mustard and mayonnaise they forgot. The female who said she was a manager, simply said "No" and offered a $2 credit ( I paid $3.50 for extra sauce)

I told her I paid xtra for sauces and the items were not edible without the dressings for salad and dipping sauces for the now cold appetizers and burger that included fries but I had no ketchup, mustard or mayo. I told her it was their fault. I have worked in F&B my whole life and that a $2 credit wasn't acceptable. She asked for my address and name, simply said "OK bye, next time I'll give you $2 credit" and hung up.

So our $62 dinner went untouched and I called my credit card company and disputed the charge for services/products not rendered. I understand drivers forget things, mistakes are made but how management chose to handle the situation was unacceptable and the business is less than 2 miles from my home. 

Never Again

This is the BEST pizza I've had since living in Vegas (10 yrs!). And I'm a pizza snob from NY. The wings were still crispy when we got home. And they are very liberal with the cheese on the pizza. Absolutely the best! We will continue to go here. So impressed!!!

I don't know. This is my usual pizza place and the food is pretty decent, but there is always something that goes wrong that really makes this place a hit or miss. I've gone to pick up, arriving after the estimated wait, and still having to wait a good 10 minutes at the restaurant/bar. And when I'd have already paid online, they would still ask for a payment when I got to the restaurant. When I would tell the waitress I had already paid, she just said "oh" and nothing else. So if you knew? Why would you ask me to pay again? And if you didn't, wouldn't you at least have to verify it was indeed paid? Something was missing there. And then of course more than one occasions they've gotten my order wrong, only to have discovered it when I did get home. Today, instead of wings, I got chicken fingers, which I did not care for. The pizza was also unusually dry and lacking enough cheese, and I never had any problems with their pizza before. Very disappointing to say the least. I don't think I'll return, even if most of the times the food IS decent.

We've ordered from this place twice now. Best thing: they're open super late for your late night cravings. Which could be a bad thing. 

Two things that made me give this place 3 stars: Service and quality of food. 
On service: They seem to take a very long time on delivery. It took over 2 hours the first time and 1 1/2 hours the second time when we were told within an hour. The last time we ordered, it took an hour and a half and I had to contact them to get the status. When the pizza and wings came, the pizza was cold. 

The food:
Garlic knots/bites. Delicious. If you've seen my other reviews, you know these are one of my favorite things. Buttery garlic bread. With hot marinara. If you don't like this, you're missing out. I ate about 10 of them. It was worth the pain. 
The pizza: Merh. It's good, but I think it has a lot of sauce vs the toppings and cheese. I like a good even amount. My boyfriend loves the pizza, but it's not my favorite. 
The wings: They are very tasty AND they offer more than just the buffalo sauce! They're not super meaty wings, but they're good. 

The pricing here is pretty decent. They serve VERY large pizzas if you'd prefer and their prices on them are very reasonable. The last time we ordered, we got 12 wings, garlic bites, 1 14" pizza with 2 toppings and 1 18" pizza with 1 topping. I think we paid $65? Which was a shit ton of food. 

Overall, this is a pretty good place to order. They offer online ordering for your convenience and again, they're open so much later than the other places that deliver which is always nice when you run out of food for parties.

So my biggest beef with this place are the ingredients are terrible, the pizza was soggy... Like really soggy. The wraps are super loose and don't expect melted cheese on your nachos, something cheese flavored maybe, but it's gross. Don't get me wrong, the people were super nice and I guess it appeals to some people for some reason but as a chef, I'd never eat here again.

Neighborhood pizza spot. Love that they serve late night food. The food was decent to me,  my bf thought it was pretty good though. Wouldn't go out of my way to go here, but will work for a late night pizza craving

Up until the last month or so I would have rated them 5 stars.  I've been ordering from them for years.  But in the last month the flavor has gone down considerably.  Don't know if they care or not, but as a consumer I'd want to know this.  I'll be looking for a new place to order from.  I can understand that once in a while things aren't as they should be, but twice in a row means something has changed and I don't like the change.

Angelina's should definitely win an award for their awesome calzones and strombolis. Now their pizzas...let's just say it's decent once you dunk it in their housemade Ranch dressing. The garlic knots are superb! Very glad that 30 pieces come in an order - not that you'll finish them all. 

Lastly, this place is pretty popular, so to-go orders can take 60 minutes. Just a heads up if your starving when you place the order.
Fantastic place can't wait to come back.  The food was fast and yummy I would recommend this to all my friends and family

The pizzas are very no well cooked, am not sure if they change owners or managers but ever to order for delivery they told me at was going to be 3 hour the girl on the phone keep putting me on hold... I was on the phone 30min trying to order
The service is fast, food plenty, but music to loud. Also, I don't know how they get away with smoking at the bar, right next to our table, with no divider.

Nice neighborhood pizzeria for when you get the munchies.  I was impressed with their pizza, wings, antipasto and variety on the menu including the Italian dinners.  Delivery is good as well as service.  Right next to Putters if you need a beer.  Hours are long and prices are right.

I ordered a speality pizza from here at 8pm one night, I only live up the block and got it take-out. I arrived 5 minutes after they said it would be done. I was greeted by an employee who told me I would pay another employee that was working the register and she would go get my food. I then sat there for 10 min without any word from an employee, just to have the same lady come out and ask if I had been helped yet!?? She had completely forgot she had talked to me. I was then finally helped, only to be told my pizza wasn't complete yet(15 min after they said it would be). And to put a top on the shit cake. I specifically ordered my pizza without black olives and guess What, black olives on my pizza. I am extremely I'm displeased with the service and staff at this restaurant and will not be ordering from them again no matter how good the pizza is, even as they are right down the street

Have been ordering delivery & dinned inside this place for the last 3 years and have always had pretty decent service.  I ordered a simple hamburger combo last evening, with mustard, NO Ketchup, NO Mayo, NO Onion and well done and an order of Mozzarella Sticks.  Alejandra (name on ticket) who took my order repeated it back and advised it would be 45 mins to an hour for delivery, I said really, for a hamburger????  About 15 mins later the knock came on the door and it was my order...WOW that was fast. l opened up the hamburger and it was not what I ordered, it had everything on it I said I didn't want....THE COOKS FAULT!!!!  The hamburger was so soggy it feel completely apart and to top it off, the hamburger patty was RAW.....I will think twice about ordering from here again....UGH....very disappointed.

Man, I was so excited to see their late hours.  After a long day at work I ordered my pizza via grubhub at 130AM.  I have a dairy allergy so I had ordered the margerita with no cheese.  After waiting patiently and still feeling oh so thankful for food, my order arrived around 220AM.  Being in the industry and understanding this was pretty late I even gave the driver a $12 tip on top of my order of $29 ($5 for grubhub- $24 for my pizza).  So after a total of $40 for a late night za, I open it up to see it covered in cheese.  If not extra cheese.  I was upset because I can not eat dairy (and no, I can't just pick it off- I will break out in hives).  Being it to late to get a new one because it was past 2, I never ended up receiving my proper order.  I even called up around 215 to see if perhaps I could credit or anything but no one answered.  Pretty upsetting experience over a simple mistake but I work in the industry and we get orders all the time, no justification for missing the instructions with the order.

Bummer.

Tried this place out with a friend and it was pretty good, I thought it would be one of smoky bar scenes but it was actually not very busy for a Saturday night. I got the chicken strips and Pizza, I really liked them both they are good and nice place to go, the waitresses were nice too. There is a bar side and restaurant side. Both were good, also a good place to watch a NHL, MLB or NFL game too. I haven't tried to beer yet, but I am sure its good!

Calzones area huge! Nice and fresh and delicious. Definitely got my money's worth. 

The dough is fresh and cooked perfectly. I was very impressed.

Oh! And the cannoli is a thing of beauty. Perfect balance of sweet and flavorful. Creamy and crispy. A great choice!

Also, to top it off, the people were super nice. 

Sure, it may have taken awhile, but everything is freshly made and cooked. I don't mind waiting an extra 10 minutes for this meal!

Awful service. Took the lady over ten minutes to take our order of one Angelina special. Quoted us $21 something for a medium pizza and said it would be 45 minutes to and hour for delivery. After waiting for   Over an hour and a half we called and asked where our pizza was, they told us it would be 5 minutes. 40 minutes later we call and speak to 3 people finishing with "Kari" she never apologized, never offered compensation, nothing! We will never give this place another order. Want to waste your time? go here. Food quality is horrible, I've heard, and the place is extremely dirty.

I was pleasantly surprised. I had a late night craving for a hamburger and didn't want to drive. I found this place on Eat24. I was skeptical about ordering anything fancy because I didn't want to be disappointed. I ordered the double hamburger and chili cheese fries. BOY WAS I HAPPY!! The burger was bigger than my two hands( I'm female and 5'3). They delivered in less then the time quoted and the delivery guy was so sweet.The food was hot!  Back to the burger. EXCELLENT!!  Juice running down my hands, flavorful, moist, and cooked just right. The chilli cheese fries could have fed 3 people for the amount they give. I give them two thumbs up and will be ordering from them again. Oh, they are open til 4am Friday and Saturday..

This place has a notoriously rude staff.  Always has been, apparently always will be.  My last time trying them out was today.  I ordered online, go to pick up and after waiting 30 minutes for a small pizza and fries, the large woman says "We are just waiting on your fries."

Really?  It takes that long to make a pizza and you can't coordinate the fries to come out at the same time?  So I literally say or do nothing.  I am displeased but rather than say anything I remain quiet.  So she says to me......."Well you don't have to stay if you don't want."

You are right.  I don't.  So I left.  Rosati's is down the street serving better pizza with a nicer staff.
After the last lunch problem, we decided to give it another try. I'm just so sick of this place! Not worth it. Service is just shitty as the food.
